title: For all those people who were always asking for it...
body:
It's happening

Pool Party Zac
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-941LNTLIa0I/VXeoGgBK2uI/AAAAAAAArMA/-_0TLmWUlE4/s1600/zzzzz.jpg

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/06/69-pbe-update.html#zac1

AND Chroma Pack Zac

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/06/69-pbe-update.html#zac2

replies.body: New skin for {{champion:154}}  is just another recolour, gj rito

> [{quoted}](name=Moreno,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AJY53LQj,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-06-10T06:18:28.316+0000)
>
> New skin for {{champion:154}}  is just another recolour, gj rito

no fucking shit, what else can you do with a guy that's all green.
it's not just a recolour there is a new recall animation and some other stuff
Hey, another recolour for a skin, everyone was dying for this.
yay its blue recolour zac with pool party ziggs scuba gear copy pasted on his head

Its not like the skin is exactly how they showed us it would be right at the start or anything.... 

see here in pool party renektons splash, you can see Zac with the same coloration and same red shorts as in his new skin, they just added some goggles (so in other words you are getting MORE than previously shown) so if you knew what the skin was going to be like wayyyyy before it was released, why are you complaining now? did you expect them to drastically change the skin from how they unofficially announced it and thus cause major continuity fails?

http://apollo-eu-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1423691987880/poolpartyzac.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AJY53LQj,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-06-10T22:41:35.155+0000)
>
> Its not like the skin is exactly how they showed us it would be right at the start or anything.... 
> 
> see here in pool party renektons splash, you can see Zac with the same coloration and same red shorts as in his new skin, they just added some goggles (so in other words you are getting MORE than previously shown) so if you knew what the skin was going to be like wayyyyy before it was released, why are you complaining now? did you expect them to drastically change the skin from how they unofficially announced it and thus cause major continuity fails?
> 
> http://apollo-eu-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1423691987880/poolpartyzac.jpg

This guy's a riot spy, get im bois.

Even the way they made him look semi-transparent looks pretty good now,
and the chromas make him look like different flavours of cotton candy
YESSSSSS!!!!!!!!!  only what  year and half  to make……
